title: Term List
description: A term list for an Azure service

title.description: A display title for the term list

term.description: The term. This value should be unique.

customer-facing.description: Should the term be included in the customer-facing glossary (true or false).

contributor-guide.description: Should the term be included in the contributor guide (true or false).

definition.description: The term definition. Use markdown formatting and links.

learn-more.description: A link to a resource in docs or on a third-party site where the user can learn more. Use the markdown link format: [Text to display](URL)

services.description: The service or services the term is associated with.

casing-rules.description: Should the term be upper or lower cased.

first-mention.description: Any guidance on first mention of the term in an article.

example-usage.description: An example sentence that shows how to use the term.
